remarks: Distributive law for inner product (right-distributivity).  Equation I3 of [Ponnusamy] p. 362.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
statement:
phlsrng.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
phllmhm.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
phllmhm.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ipdir.g $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
ipdir.p $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` F ) $.
ipdir $p |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( ( A .+ B ) ., C ) = ( ( A ., C ) .+^ ( B ., C ) ) ) $.
